title: ArgumentException: The thing you want to instantiate is null.

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am getting the error below appearing in my console:

error ArgumentException: The thing that you want to instantiate is null.
Unity Engine.Object.CheckNullArgument (System.Object arg,
System.String.Message)

sections.title: Cause
content: This error is caused when you use a script to instantiate a GameObject that does not reference a prefab.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You will need to assign a reference to the GameObject that you wish to instantiate via the inspector or a script.
